text: Philippe Rahmy (5 June 1965 - 1 October 2017) was a Swiss poet and writer. He was born in Geneva, Switzerland. He was a founding member of the prominent French literary site remue.net which focused on promoting contemporary literature over the Internet and through live events. He also worked as a photographer and as a director of award-winning independent short movies. In 2017, he won the Swiss Literature Award. Rahmy died of complications from brittle bone disease in Geneva on 1 October 2017 at the age of 52.Philippe Rahmy, une plume envolée au ciel ==References== ==Other websites== * Bibliothèque cantonale universitaire * articles by Philippe Rahmy on remue.net * texts by Philippe Rahmy on remue.net * poetry books edited by Cheyne Editeur * rahmyfiction.net Philippe Rahmy's blog Category:1965 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Switzerland Category:Swiss poets Category:Swiss novelists Category:Swiss photographers Category:Writers from Geneva Category:21st-century artists
title: Philippe Rahmy
